summary: This document outlines the responsibilities and delegation of authority within a committee at Deutsche Bank, specifically regarding the monitoring and control of reputational risk reports and other related tasks. It details the roles of the Chairperson and Vice-chairperson, as well as the voting members of the committee.

persons.name: Chief Risk Officer Americas
persons.context: Serves as the Chairperson of the Committee responsible for overseeing reputational risk.

persons.name: Chief Operating Officer Americas
persons.context: Serves as the Vice-chairperson of the Committee and assumes responsibilities in the Chairperson's absence.

keyFacts: The document discusses the delegation of authority within a committee at Deutsche Bank.
The Chief Risk Officer Americas is the Chairperson of the Committee.
The Chief Operating Officer Americas serves as the Vice-chairperson.
The Committee currently does not delegate responsibilities to sub-committees or individual position holders.
